com.github.project.server

Class MathServerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.project.server.MathServerMain

  • public class MathServerMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the server-side program. It launches the processing thread and listens/accepts connection requests from the clients.
    Since:
    31 October 2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nathan Beck

      static void acceptRequestConnections(int serverPort)
      This method listens for connection requests and accepts them if possible.
      static void launchProcessingQueueThread()
      This method launches the thread that processes math requests.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the entry method of the program. It launches the processing thread and listens/accepts connection requests.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments passed by the loader/command line

      • launchProcessingQueueThread

        public static void launchProcessingQueueThread()
        This method launches the thread that processes math requests.

      • acceptRequestConnections

        public static void acceptRequestConnections(int serverPort)
        This method listens for connection requests and accepts them if possible. It does this action in an infinite loop until the server is terminated.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - The TCP port on which to accept connection requests
